name: Ambushed in the Snow
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Target a stunned character up to two ranks away. This character may immediately attack without spending, with all strikes targeting the stunned character.

name: Frost
effect:
Dwarf.Barbarian.Warlord.Unique
React: After one of Frost's melee strike rolls results in a natural 18, 19, or 20 or a critical success, inflict 1 wound on all characters adjacent to the target if Frost is you Warlord

name: Goth'ak
effect:
Nothrog.Scout.Warlord.Unique
Spend Order:React: After a ranged strike with a printed bonus greater than the level of the target, performed by one of your Nothrog characters has resolved, discard a card from your hand to spend the target of the strike.

name: Ice Blade
effect:
Weapon
React: Spend and stun the Ice Blade after this character successfully hits with a melee strike to force the target of the strike to make a magic save (DC 20) or become spend and force the target's controller to discard a card of choice from his hand.

name: Ice Shield
effect:
Shield
+1 hit point
React: Spend and stun the ice Shield when this character is suffering wounds to reduce the wounds suffered by 1 (minimum 0).

name: Ja'leeque
effect:
Mercenary.Shaman.Warlord.Unique
Order: Once per turn, spend Ja'leeque or stun another one of your Shamans in this rank to select a rank up to 3 ranks away. Until the end of the turn, characters become stunned immediately after moving out of the selected rank.

name: Kaan Mallock
effect:
Free Kingdoms.Ranger.Warlord.Unique
Your other Free Kingdoms Rangers and Scouts have Stealth +5
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
Order: Target and spend one of your Rangers or Scouts in the same rank as an opponent's Warlord. Choose and discard one card from the opponent's hand.

name: Kolivan
effect:
Elf.Druid.Warlord.Unique
Order: Onve per turn, take up to two cards from the top of your deck and attach them face down to Kolivan as Pets.
Order: While in the first rank, spend a Pet attached to Kolivan, to have that Pet attack as a level 1 classless character with a +0 ATK, 6 AC, 1 hit point and +0 skill.

name: Sir Rallen
effect:
Deverenian.Warlord.Scout.Unique
If Rallen is your Warlord, your Deverenians have the ability: "Spend Order: Perform a Ranged Strike with a bonus equal to this character's level. This ranged strike may not receive any bonus to the roll".
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes.

name: Summon Avalanche
effect:
Cleric and wizard Only. This is a spell.
Spend Order: Target a rank up to 2 ranks away. All characters in that rank must make a reflex save (DC 14). A ready character who fails this save is spent. A spent character who fails this save is stunned. A stunned character who fails this save suffers 1 wound.

name: Winter Armor
effect:
Armor
Spend React: Spend and stun the Winter Armor after an opposing character moves into an adjacent rank to have this character immediately perform an attack without spending, with all strikes targeting the character who just moved into the adjacent rank.

name: Winter Warfare
effect:
Warlord only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, characters may not move unless Maneuvering or falling to correct illegal ranks. Readied characters falling forward become stunned. Spent characters falling forward become stunned (if not already stunned) and suffer 1 wound.
